amendment.description: To make permanent certain education-related tax incentives.

action.text: Amendment SA 113 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 113 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 50. Record Vote Number: 30.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 113.
Amendment SA 113 proposed by Senator Smith to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1021; text: CR S1021) To make permanent certain education-related tax incentives.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 113 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 50. Record Vote Number: 30.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 113 proposed by Senator Smith to Amendment SA 100.
